Eclipse crashes? or the program that you are debugging?

The stack traces from your log are a red herring. If you look at the code in 
JavaDebugHover#getHoverInfo(...), you'll see that we catch the debug exception, 
write to the log, and then handle it gracefully. If Eclipse is crashing for you, 
this isn't the cause.
